author: Indrek R
title: Spring weekend in Paris
text:
I truly want to give my respect and lift the feedback figures of this wonderful hotel in Center of Paris. We planned a short family trip for the spring and found this good offer for a 5-star hotel in the same house with a world-famous PG restaurant. The reviews for the hotel were not the highest, so we were prepared for "just fine" level. BUT! :) Everything we experienced was over any expectations. The hospitality of the staff from the first to the last minute was perfect. In a way we enjoyed the size of the lobby and a kind of "hidden" doorway. It was like coming home, Dear Friends!
Room size - good even for 3 of us!
Room cleanliness- perfect
Breakfast- good standard for Paris
We used a lot of help and asked for advices from the concierge and other employees and we were really happy with the results!
If there was anything to change then that would be a slight refurnishing the back hall of breakfast room, but this didn't affect any of our pleasure.
Please use this home-like and fair-priced luxury close to AdT.
Katrin, Indrek, Mia
